title: Chhandamtu nung rawng ka bawl kan zingah a awm a
lyrics:
Chhandamtu nung rawng ka bawl, kan zingah a awm a, 
Miten eng pawh sawi mah se, a nung tih ka hria a; 
A zahngaihna ka hmu a, a muanna aw ka hria, 
Amah ka ngaih ber laiin, a hnai ren gthin.

A nung, a nung, 
Krista Isua a nung, 
Kan leng dun thin, kan inkawm thin; 
Nun kawng zim takah hian, 
A nung, a nung, chhandamna pe turin; 
Engtin nge ka hriat min zawt maw? 
A nung, ka thinlungah.

A hmangaih enkawlna hlir ka hmu, ka hawi vel hian, 
Ka thinlung lo chau mah se, ka beidawng ngai lo vang; 
Min hruai zel tih ka hria a, thlipui hlauhawmah pawh, 
A lo kal leh ngei dawn e, min hruai turin.

Kristian, hlimin zai rawh u, in aw neih zawngte chuan, 
Kan Lalpa Isua fakin, 'Haleluia,' tiin; 
A zawngtute beiseina, a hmutu tanpuitu, 
Hmangaih, ngilnei, amah ang reng an awm lo.
